content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone, at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on 11/18/2015
========================================================================

in the summer of 1962, when i was 12 or 13 years old, i went outside after dinner, and at the end of the driveway i saw what looked like a silver upside down  street light, just hovering. it had a dome on the top and looked like an upside down bowl.It was shiny and chrome looking. it was about 15'x 10' in size and about 50' from me, hovering at the treetops. it sped off toward the north at a 45 degree angle and was gone.
the local radio station reported people seeing the craft flying over the highway. the now defunct station was kfdi, and old mike owned the station in those days. the kwch night news anchor john wright, used to work there.
content.summary: In the summer of 1962, when i was 12 or 13 years old, i went outside after dinner, and at the end of the driveway a saw what looked like a silver upside down  street light hovering

content.detailedDescription: Extremely large black object. looked like space shuttle without wings or tail. two square equadistant windows underneath. looked like frosted glass with dull light behind them. moving arrow straight, from north to south, fast and silent, like it was under water. never seen anything like this in my 53 years. and i am expirienced with unecknowleged programs involving air and space vehicles.I was a 085 guard for the dod. this was mind blowing. but i left the guard in 94, so who knows, could be ours. sorry, no video, no other witnesses that i know of. alone in my yard at 2:40am nov. 18, 2015, after terrible wind storm, assessing damage to my home. however, did see a brilliant shooting star right before this mega ship passed over.
content.summary: Mind blowing.

content.detailedDescription: Nous somme moi ma femme te un ami (45/36/57ans)nous sommes sur une terrasse ciel très beau pas de nuage et vue que je prend la avion souvent j'étai entrain de observer un avion a 9000/10000 et regarde la traîner blanche de l'avion quand deux lumière éblouissante sorte des trase de l'avion une des deux a rattrapée la première est en suite sont monté droit vers l'espace et disparue après deux trois minute nous avons une video je aïs aller la police m est bon mon dit fau venir mr    je pouvais retrouver la date exacte et l'heure demain avec mon amies et la video dois être dans mon ordinateur ce message et envoyé de mon mobile téléphone la video et dans ordinateur je vous les envoie apres
content.summary: Lumières très forte

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed it right after my flight was airborne.
it was sitting stationary the entire time our flight ascended.
i observed it for a few minutes before deciding to try and get a picture of it. i asked the person next to me if they saw it as well and he acknowledged that he did.
i observed it until i couldn't see it anymore (our plane was flying away from it).
it never moved. at one point i thought it was spinning but i couldn't determine that. 
the object was east of our plane, which was heading west to san francisco.
content.summary: I noticed the ufo after my plane took off. there was another plane that took off right before ours but it was long gone. this ufo was hovering right outside of the denver airport...I noticed it within 3 minutes of being in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter informed me she had seen these lights so i checked it out. i have watched them on and off for about two weeks in the night sky (westerly and high up) and i have seen the light flash blue and red and white which i can see without aid of binoculars. last night the light was moving much more than usual when i observe it. it can move in all direction and at one time it made an assent in a small spiral motions. last night it desended straight downward in the biggest movement i have seen. i saw if above my neighbor's roof at first and suddenly it moved downward until i could not see it (in was below the rooftop). i went upstairs and it was there, went downstairs again and could not see it.

this light definitely moves in all directions and some nights seems to not be as active but last night it was moving more than i had seen before.

when i first was shown the light my daughter pointed out a not as bright star/light in a more southern direction and i saw it move too. she now tells me she sees 5 of them. i have only watched the single one on a regular basis.
content.summary: Observed brighter star like light thaat changes color of flahing lights and moves in different direction sometimes small and other times larger movement

content.detailedDescription: I wonder to this day about this sighting.I was a teenager..Something woke me up..My bedroom was aglow in orange red light.I thought something was on fire outside..I stood up in my bed and looked out the window.I was shocked at what i saw, this object just over the trees across the street just floating there.I was frozen in fear or shock and could not cry out to call my brother to come see it..He was asleep in the room next to mine.Then it was gone. to this day i can draw the image..I ask myself did i really see this.
content.summary: Woke up room bathed in reddish orange light stood up in bed looked out window there it was

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on rt 47 at approximately 8:30 pm, as i approached the intersection with turnpike rd. i observed two white landing lights on what i first thought was a large jet plane. i first thought it was flying away from me as i was driving north but its size did not diminish after driving about ½ mile. i thought if it was a large jet plane it was moving far too slowly. i was travelling at 45 mph so it should have been traveling much faster.Then i realized it was actually coming towards me not flying away. all i could see at this point were its two bright white lights and pulsating white “tail light” intermittently obscured by tall trees. at this point i pulled the car over and stopped while looking at it. i estimate its altitude at 500 to 1000 feet with a span of 100 to 200+ feet. as i sat pulled over, it slowly and noiselessly flew above me and continued south along rt. 47. as it passed i stepped on the gas and took off north. when i reached the intersection of rt 47 and turnpike rd. in just a few seconds, i looked back and saw it continuing south above rt 47 at the same slow pace. from the rear angle i could not see the two landing lights but only the white pulsating “tail light” at the rear. note: there was no vertical tail. from this angle the object looked like a giant diamond shaped kite deep black with its outlines glowing or shimmering. it's possible it was a b-2 spirit stealth bomber, although it made no noise and did not display the typical red and green running lights most plane use while flying at night. i am very familiar with all kinds of aircraft and i am not sure what this was.
content.summary: Large diamond or flying wing shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking our dog out in our backyard and looked up as a private plane was flying over from the south, flying in a generally northerly direction. i quickly noticed a white orb moving along with the plane, off it's right wing. the orb then stopped and started moving about in a controlled yet somewhat erratic manner. as it moved back towards the southeast direction, i could clearly see it was metallic externally as it reflected the sun off of it's surface. i watched it for about 5 minutes before i lost it in the bright morning sun.

i occasionally see unusual things in the night skies, but this is only the second time i have ever observed something unknown in the daytime skies.
content.summary: White orb observed next to private airplane

content.detailedDescription:
5 time-stamped images of 2 ufo(s) were captured by an east-facing reconnyx hyperfire 900 series camera deliberately aimed at the sky as part of a ufo research project. one of the photos, m 5/20, shows two ufos, and one of those ufos is seen quite clearly! i did not see this event happen with my own eyes, but the camera did capture and record the noon, november 4 event quite nicely - an even better tool than my own eyes because i still have the images! photo m 3/20 does have one of the 2 ufos in the photo but you must look very carefully to find it. i cannot find either ufo in photos m 2/20 or m 4/20. an identical south-facing camera recorded nothing at that time.

these cameras are affixed to an exterior, east-facing wall of my rural home near helena, mt. they have been in place and in constant operation for approximately 2 years. over that time the 2 cameras have captured several images suggestive that they could be ufos, but none as clear as these recent images. these cameras are aimed at the air space surrounding the jesse a. marcel (ufo) library, a location where those interested in the ufo phenomenon gather weekly to meet, learn, and discuss the ufo and other possibly related phenomenon in an environment that is free of derision or ridicule. 

i have sifted through approximately 279,266 images captured by these cameras before finally capturing these high quality images we have all along been hoping to acquire. the images i am sending all are exact copies of the original images (still retained on the sd card) and have not been altered or tampered with in any way, other than an enlargement i am sending of image m 5/20.

the feeling that i had when i opened image m 5/20 was one of shock and then of elation! it was so vindicating to see this image after so many years of believing in the reality of ufos, a subject that much of our society continues to dismiss as nonsense. well, now i know for certain that ufos are anything but nonsense, and we now have the photos to prove
it! in my opinion these photos are proof-positive that ufos exist.
content.summary: 5 time-stamped  images captured by a trail camera pointed at the sky show ufo(s), one very clearly seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to reference that there was a minor earthquake (2.5 on richter scale) at 8:15 pm est approx. 2.5 km to the east of my residence before i witnessed this.

approx. 1 hour later at 9:18 pm est i was out walking my dog on stone st. in bellingham, ma.  i was looking up for shooting stars and i saw a very bright red/orange diamond shaped object approx 20 degrees above the western horizon.  i thought it might have been a shooting star, but it hovered (not moving at all) for around 5 minutes, emitting no sound.  i opened a sky map app on my phone, and in that direction there was only neptune, which this was obviously not.

i was wearing a head lamp and looking up at the object and then it started to move.  i kept my eyes on it and it start to climb very quickly and moved to a very high altitude (possibly sub orbital)and was no longer a red/orange diamond, but was now blinking, resembling a satellite or a plane of some sort.  i watched and followed it as it moved into the high southern sky, when it disappeared before my eyes.

i was curious, but not nervous when i saw this object, as i have never witnessed anything i could not explain before.  i researched if there were any satellite launches at that time, but i found none (there was a russian launch, but it was at 1:34 am est earlier the same day.)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed a bright red/orange diamond shaped object that hovered for several minutes then gained altitude to near orbital after changing shape and blinking

content.detailedDescription: I had forgotten the event and taking the pictures as my mother had passed away a few hours earlier this was a couple weeks ago. when i transferred my camera pictures to my computer yesterday i was surprised to see what i had forgotten about.. here's what happened.. it was about 4 hours after my mom had died and i couldn't sleep.. so i went into my dining area and stared out my patio door into the dark moonless nite. after about a half hour i noticed what looked like blue lines in space going south at a slow pace. i know they were going south as the stars behind them were going from east to west because of the earth's rotation. curious about what i was looking at i grabbed my binoculars and a camera. i took one picture in the general direction not really being able to see the blue lines on my camera view finder. i started looking thru my binoculars and was surprised to see the two brightest blue orbs were connected with a blue haze in between making it look like a line in space with the naked eye. i have no way to judge how large what appeared to look like a tube was, but it was far out in space and had to be huge. i captured that image on my camera as well as the other blue orb that was far to the left looking like a bell shaped object and going in the same southernly direction, on my pictures most everything looks black except the blue orbs. when the pictures are enlarged with the slide in the lower right corner, everything comes into focus as i have described, with pulling the images to the center of the picture even the stars behind start to show and without a heavy pixilation, the clarity is there. i have one other picture that i thought was weird that these orbs went towards and into. i kept watching thru my binoculars as the blue orbs went farther south towards what looked like a real faint almost round cluster of stars. the blue orbs didn't slow as they got close but seemed to go into the star cluster with the bright blue orbs disappearing as soon as the last one was in. they didn't appear to come out the other side if they were just passing thru. i snapped a picture of this really faint round star like cluster right after the orbs disappeared. i have this picture too although you have to really look to see the round cluster in the blackness of the lower part of picture when it is enlarged. with all theory i have heard about over the years about time travel and worm holes, i can not help but to believe that was what i saw happen with those blue orbs going into a worm hole. the first picture i took in the general direction without looking thru my binoculars captured a strange image in space that when enlarged becomes heavily pixilated earlier while looking strangle like the side profile of the space shuttle. i am baffled by that image. i can't believe i forgot about what i saw so quickly after i opened my pictures up yesterday and enlarged the blackness to see what i saw then. i guess i was just exhausted with being with my mom the last 10 days before she passed. i tried loading the pictures on twice  for scrutinization but couldn't do just the specific pictures only--it wants to take all my files and i won't do that. i can e-mail these photos to anyone with a direct email address who would like to see them. you have my email address.
content.summary: 3 bright blue orbs, 2 of the 3 connected going south in space in the same path into what appeared as a star cluster

content.detailedDescription: I start getting a little scared? it is outside here several days a week and starts getting a little bekyret over what it is. filmed it through my window this time.
content.summary: It was not star clear. but dark skyes.

content.detailedDescription: This happened on the puyallup reservation close to the emerald queen casino. heard a strange sound coming from the sky. sounded odd which is why it caught my attention, and it was very loud and close by, probably not more than a mile away. there seems to be 3 distinctly different objects that were travelling close together. one of the objects was cylindercle with what appears to be strange markings on it and the other 2 were disc like. i have had even closer encounters with the  cylindercle object before. also have had previous strange encounters with various other beings. i have an image of one being that appeared or projected its image to me. i have more images of different beings. some seem to be trying to communicate with me. i have knowledge of where some of these entities/ beings are coming from. ive seen some of their structures and have learned a little about how their structures function. i don't think many of them want me to share what  i know and have learned about them. as they have made many of my best photo unacces sible.
content.summary: It seemed to follow me, very loud jet like with pulsating. seem to use and blend with clouds to conceal its presence.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching an aircraft travelling east approximately over the city of chester.  i then noticed a bright light travelling from north to south, the light was moving at speed then faded out for less than a second. the light shone bright for a very brief moment the disappeared. the object was close enough to the other airlift when it disappeared, i could still see the other aircraft but no object. at first i thought it may be a reflection of the sun onto an aircraft, but it dawned on me quickly that i was viewing the object with the sun behind the object as i was travelling from west to east as the sun was coming up, so any light should have been reflecting on the opposite side.
content.summary: I was watching a plane turning in the sky as i was travelling from west to east,  i then noticed a bright light travelling from to approx north to south just behind the aircraft. the light the faded out came back then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
around june 11 1982,before little greys were widely known , and certainly before i had seen one, i had an encounter. a newly built shed would be unused for a couple of weeks , so i was given the privilege of moving my drums into the place and i could stay there. it was way back even further than the barn.
  one evening , i left my folks house , walked passed the barn , and got to my shed.
  the smell of the new wood , as i entered the shed was amazing . and there was my wonderful drum set glistening in the moonlight , which shown through the big side door. 
  i lit a candle and tapped around a bit. i found it funny to tap the snare to the same beat that the hogs do when they throw down the lids of there feeders. tap ..Tap......Tap..Tap.
  i finally got tired so i climed onto the old army cot and the two quilts and dozed off. 
  about the time i was almost totally asleep a shock hit the back of my ear. i turned over to find out what the heck , and there as i rubbed my eyes trying to focus on things in the dim moonlight , was a strange figure. it startled me at first and i blinked more to try and focus. it was still there. almost see through grey. black eyes , thin body , big head , thin mouth , tiny nose , it may have had some cape on , couldn`t focus well enough to tell. it`s shoulders and cheek bones seemed to stick out more. i focused on its eyes , and they were still there. this was very scary , but i felt it was a being also , so i didn`t freak out or look away , and so staring at each other for a moment i was curious and so i laid my arm out towards it in a friendly gesture. about that same speed it glided back. a floating motion. staring still at each other and me being tired and nothing happening , and still being pretty freaked out , i decided to roll over , forget about it , and go back to sleep.
  so that`s what i did , and when i woke up , one of the pigs had slashes on its side. perhaps the alien was taking refuge in my shed because there was a cougar around. 
  some people didn't know if they believed me , because i had just seen e.T. the extra terrestrial. that`s understandable , but i reassured them that this wasn`t e.T. , and actually was differant in many ways. 
  i am glad this happened to me. it has always carried a special place in the tales of my childhood.
content.summary: Alien takes refuge in shed from couger

content.detailedDescription:
i was out walking my dog just before midnight.  the sky was clear and the stars were unusually bright.  as i was looking up at the sky, i noticed and extremely bright star.  it first appeared to be round with beams of light emitted from it in bright white (as one would envision the christmas star).  it was the only star that bright, all the others were "normal". 
     after almost half a minute of keeping an eye on just that "star", i noticed that the rays it produced were only forming on the top half of the orb.  looking closer, i noticed that it was not just white with a hint of blue.  two different shades of blue were present with flashes of red and green. when a flash ended, the space it had been in was more amber than yellow or white.  
    i thought, even at this point, my eyes were playing tricks on me. so, i waited and thought i saw it move up then down.  the dog started pulling on his leash, so i went inside.  
     about 10 minuets later, i decided that i wanted to take another look and headed back outside.  it was sill there, and the color activity was more intense.  the shape was more disc like, but i could not see the actual bottom.  it looked like the light illuminated the outline of the top of the disc, with the light being emitted from the top.  now when the colors appeared, they ran from left to right along the rim of the disc, and came one after the other.  one color would get just past the middle of the object and another would begin it's trip around.  
     again, i thought i noticed movement, so i purposely stepped into an area where there were low tree branches.  since there was no wind, i could use this vantage point as a marker to see if there really was movement.  
    the object swayed left to right, like it was in a hammock.  then it traveled up from below a branch to well above it, then back down, not going fast and never going back to the exact same space.  i knew this was not me moving as i had sat down in a chair to be sure to be steady and not rock or sway as i stood looking up.  
     i stood watching it become more mobile for 5 minuets more then headed inside for 5 minuets.  when i went back outside to check on it again, it was further south than it had been. very little light activity was happening at this point, and the swaying had stopped.  i immediately came in to report this.
    something very similar happened south of us two months ago and my husband saw it with me.  i believe it is the same object.
content.summary: Pulsating lights with color changes at widest part of circumference, swaying motion with up and down directional spurts

content.detailedDescription: Bright diamond shaped light, 11:45pm, driving on rural road due east. light gets brighter and seems to be getting lower to the ground. we follow the object for 1-1.5 miles, then the object changes direction abruptly from westward to due north. still only 400-500 feet from ground. at which point we flash cars high beams elaborately at the object which is when it increased to very fast speeds( 2,000-2,500 mph) and disappears due north.
content.summary: Bright diamond shaped light. we followed for 1-1.5 miles then light changes direction abruptly from westward to north object speeds up and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on rs ave in kalamazoo with my friend tyler when we seen a red flame type shape. we weren't sure if it was something falling but then it started to just glow white and when it seen us pivoted and took off fast after we flashed our brights at it. we kept trying to follow but it was too fast and trees made us lose track
content.summary: Looked on fire close to observation stopped path pivoted then accelerated after we flashed our brights at it

content.detailedDescription:
3 orbs flying in formation captured sunday december 1st 
2015 at a ufo event of ours in hilltop park signalhill ca
these ufo's were filmed through our 2 years of ufo field research events where we meditate on telepathically beaconing to anything to show up for us wto witness and document. as you can see we have seen many anomalous sightings that cant be explained by our conventional crafts or earthly objects. this is important because people will only believe what they see with there own 2 eyes. i have no strong thoughts that footage would ever convince anyone but with the events we have been holding for so long now i have no doubt in my mind that if people around the world started doing this and showing people sightings first hand the whole world would soon become believers

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

here is the footage of those odd ufo's flying in a strange pattern
content.summary: 3 ufo's flying in an intriguing unexplainable formation

content.detailedDescription:
We witnessed this object over lax in shock that a ufo was over the airspace in the same path the airplanes fly over and a place drones arnt even allowed to fly over. we filmed it on 2 cameras and documented the sighting to show people that there are ufo's that show up over lax that seem to go undetected by radar as we didnt witness any reaction from the airport to this hovering object over there skies and planes.

heres the footage of the object we witnessed that day

https://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=p0mmi5yxnhi
content.summary: Object witnessed right over lax in lax airspace

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at my salon and went outside to have a cigarette and looked up.
2. people were calling me telling me to look at the sky because others also saw it. 
3. i thought it was ufo orbs.
4. there were three orbs in the formation of a triangle and then they were moving and touching each other and would multiply, then when they touched again they would decrease in numbers. they were going in different directions with no set pattern.
5. i'm shocked. when they got lower it scared me.
6. they disappeared after an hour and a half.
content.summary: There were three triangle orb shapes that hovered and would join and join and multiply

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my son and friend flying quadcopters at a soccer field.
i looked up and saw what i thought was two planes in a refueling formation. after i watched it for a bit i realized that it was a solid craft. it also had an escort. it was night so i couldn't tell what type of plane the escort was. i watched it until it flew out of sight.


i do think this is probably a military craft because of the escort. i don't know what the difference in altitude between the two was but if they were at a similar height then the triangle was gigantic. imagine a fly sitting next to a bald eagle. that was about the size difference. 

the craft was big enough that it would have covered a full moon. it wasn't an equilateral triangle, it was isosceles. 

i am a member of mufon. this whole time it never occurred to me to take out my phone and snap some photos. now i'm kicking myself for it.
content.summary: Triangle, light on each corner, red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister, toddler son and i were driving home from a shopping trip. it was approximately 5:20 - 5:25 pm. we were driving a chevy tahoe at approximately 45 mph behind a school bus which was 1/4 a mile ahead with driving lights on. it was very dark, so we were driving with our high beams on. the area we were traveling through is known to have many deer crossing the road so we were alert, but talking to one another as we traveled through the area. i was in the driver's seat and my sister was seated in the passenger seat. my son was seated on the rear, center seat in his carseat. we had the local radio playing at a low volume. suddenly my sister stopped talking my sentence. i noticed her sudden silence and just at that moment i saw a yellow-orange light approximately the size of a basketball retreating down the hill away from us down the center of the road. i immediately said, "did you see that?" she gasped and yelled,  "yes!!" my immediate response was to ask her if she saw a light. she told me she had. she was scared. shaken up. i asked her where it came from. she told me it had come out of the woods toward the car, then abruptly turned left and then went out of sight. that had been when i saw it in the rear view mirror. 

we continued on the way home, talking about it the whole way. we speculated on whether it was the headlight of an atv, but ruled that out. my sister said it wasn't attached to anything,  and also pointed out that the atv s tend to have reflective lights and tailights, of which we had not seen any. it had maintained it's round sphere shape throughout.  of it had been an atv it would have cast a light. this did not. it maintained a steady shape and dull, orangish light. it had a slight yellow aura, almost like a streetlight casting light in the distance. 5hat had been my initial thinking when i had seen it in my rear view mirror. it was larger and much lower than a streetlight, however, which is what prompted me to ask my sister whether she had seen it. 

it never made a noise that we could hear. the radio continued to play, so if it had made a noise we never heard it.

my sister was scared. i never felt fear, or anxiety or anything. i had tried to figure out what it was, to logic it. i am not sure what it could have been. it didn't seem natural in origin. it wasn't particularly bright, however. it seemed to be as bright as a candle or an old, bulb style flashlight. we couldn't see any details on it. when it came out of the woods it was nearly parallel with the passenger side window and seemed to continue to keep that altitude as it receded down the mountain. the location we witnessed it at was heading uphill, nearly to owl's head, right before we made it to the top of the hill. 

thank you for letting me report this, and thank you for all that you and your organization do.
content.summary: Witnessed basketball size yellow-orange orb emerge from trees and move away from us while in a vehicle

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out from work when i noticed red lights in the sky. realizing it was a triangle shape hovering completely still i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter. when i went to pull my phone out of my jacket to take a picture, the lights disappeared instantly.
content.summary: Red triangles hovering over the kohls in poway, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the side porch on a warm summer night with my parents talking and i glanced at neighbors lawn when i spotted a disc over the neighbor's pine trees. i yelled and pointed at the object and looked at my parents to see if they saw it. i raced into the house to retrieve my 35mm  camera to film it. when i got back outside on the porch it was gone. i ran to the direction it was traveling but it was a wooded area behind the property. the object was gone.
content.summary: A round disc with round portals rotating clock-wise above 60 foot pine trees

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my car by my neighborhood looking up at sky like i usually do. just listening to music and just star gazing.
2. i dont know how and i still don't know how to explain but it was as if i distinguished it from all the stars; it was bigger and brighter and sure enough a stared at it long enough and it started to show intelligent movement.
3. at first i thought it could've been my imagination, or a satellite, or even a shooting star but no it wasn't any of those; and it couldn't be a plane and helicopters because those were passing along at the same time this was occurring. the anomaly was way too high, it looked like a star.
4. okay i saw 4 orb like, star-like anamolies that reacted to my awareness of them! i know it sounds crazy and outlandish but i know what i saw. i also saw one of them eject a camouflaged boomerang looking thing, and also saw 3 different shooting white spheres with a bluish after glow when the shot downward and faded out! however the 4 starlike spheres, all four of them i kept track and didn't lose them and each of them stayed. they weren't scared they trusted me or something because none of them left not even when i got home to look once more. i concentrated on one of them and sure enough when they realized i was looking at them they showed movement and sometimes eratic movement.
5. i felt like crying and was scared and happy and awestricken; i couldn't believe this was actually happening to me. i tested my hypothesis of this sort of telepathic communication several times within the whole 1 of this event. it worked every single time.
6. i didn't lose sight of any of them!!! it's insane. they didn't leave. they stayed in their "frozen star like" parking until i got home until i looked up again. sure enough they moved. but only the 4 white orbs, the other things i saw like i said just either faded out or disappeared.

-i know this sounds crazy, but please you'll be the only ones to believe me even slightly-
content.summary: I believe i was communicating with them via my mind; they reacted intelligently when i awknowledged them. when i saw them they saw me and moved when i asked them to.

content.detailedDescription: I was picking my daughters from a friends home down the street. i had done this many times before and a we drove north up 26th street in blue springs we began up the hill, and as i drove my daughters and i aw what we thought was a shooting star falling directly down toward the earth.  suddenly the object stopped above the ground and 3 or 4 orbs dropped out or exited the object, then abruptly the object shot straight up and dissapeared. my youngest daughter immediately asked ” dad what was that?” i replied ” sweetie i don't know what that was.” our home was at the top of the hill and we pulled into the driveway.  i got out, as did the girls and we all kind of scanned the sjy for a minute to see if it was gone but we didnt see any trace of the object. recently, i saw another object that had similar behavior but i was alone this time. i was headed noth on 7hwy at 2 in the morning and had the same experience as i passed the ammunition plant.
content.summary: A bright orb descended down 3 or 4 objects exited craft and then it ascended at an extremely fast rate

content.detailedDescription:
Took pictures in the backyard and after looking at the on the camera found the attached picture of what looks like a ufo. the pic is still on myn camera and i would like to have a expert look at camera since i do not know what it is. picture taken before and after the picture in question was taken do not show anything abnormal and the were taken only a few second apart.
1. in our backyard taking pictures of our pond,etc.
2. when i downloaded the pictures to my computer
3.A ufo since there was nothing around us.
4. only showed up on the picture.
5.Did not and still do not know what it is or was.
6.Only saw it on the picture.
first picture attached was taken before the ufo pic
second pic is the pic in question
third pic taken after the ufo pic
please let me know that you received this.
content.summary: As per attached photo

content.detailedDescription: I live in oklahoma was working security and was watching storm come in late at night around 3 am on 11/17/2015 a bright red and white light at first i thought it was a tower light but then noticed it moving slowely it moved to the south i was facing west at this point i thought it to be a plane coming in cause of the storm but then the light went back the direction it came from back to the north  then it stopped and went back west the direction changes where like almost instant the bright light then kept going west for a short distance then stopped and hovered the fell straight down below the tree line at a pace that was alittle slower than just dropping a ball in front of you  the after a few seconds 10 to 20 seconds the light came back over the tree line at the same speed straight up and stopped at the same altitude that it started at hovered then continued west a short time and stopped and hovered and dropped again like the first time and like the first time came straight back up to the same spot was straight down below tree line then up again to same spot then the bright light hovered then went west again and stopped hovered and dropped below the tree line like the previous times i watched for it to come back up but this time i didn't see it come back up watch for a few mins to see it come back up but never saw it again and i saw all of this as a storm was going on high winds and mild rain i pretty sure that a plane and a helicopter are not able to move like this
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other,N/A
content.summary: Bright red and white light droping and raising hoving during storm at different spots rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
Was star watching  and saw what apeared to be a shooting star that was the first one it came in from atmosphere glow yellow gold maybe orange like a fire ball so i thought i saw a merotorite the night in question there was a merorite shower i would leave it at that but the second one i saw did not act like a  merorite


the second one came in like a merorite in my  sight it looked like it went a 1/2 inch to a inch then turn 90 degrees went about 2-3 inches and made anther 90 degree turn almost like a 2/3 of a triangle in the sky after i saw this i watch for anther 1/2 an hour and nothing also when i closed my eyes i could still see this image on my eye lids now im am not saying anything here but what i saw who knows maybe i have the beginning of a brain tumor like in the movie phonamion you know with john trovlota i will draw u guys a pic the  hole even was about 90 seconds  or two minutes but the acuale sighting of these lets call them metorites was about 1/2 second each  but between the two of them i would say it was 2 minutes i have to say i never saw a metorite change direction never the less two times and look like 2/3 of a tringle in the sky it kinda looked like a camera that got that move on a light it kinda of reminden me of an ech a skech in the sky guess im losing it but its what i saw
content.summary: Metorite?
